snippet: Our Summer Reading Contest begins! This week our judges are a team from Random House Kids, and the winners will be announced on July 1. Students 13 to 19, post your pick by Thursday, June 27.
abstract: Our Summer Reading Contest begins! This week our judges are a team from Random House Kids, and the winners will be announced on July 1. Students 13 to 19, post your pick by Thursday, June 27.

headline.main: Summer Reading Contest | What Interested You Most in The Times This Week?
